To: Maria Ali <Maria.Ali@chalhoub.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Anas DABA <Anas.Daba@chalhoub.com>; Sara Akhdar <Sara.Akhdar@chalhoub.com>; Lemuel Africa <lemuel.africa@levelshoes.com>; Ligith Mathew <ligith.mathew@ae.elizabetharden.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Mark Hourany <Mark.Hourany@chalhoub.com>; Ankit Bhagchandani <Ankit.Bhagchandani@chalhoub.com>; Sara Bermudez <Sara.Bermudez@faces.com>; Guillaume Cazin <Guillaume.Cazin@chalhoub.com>; marivic.africano@lvmhbeauty.com <marivic.africano@lvmhbeauty.com>; Guy Cocks <Guy.Cocks@chalhoub.com>; Arshad Ali Khan <Arshad.Alikhan@chalhoub.com>
CC: Dany Nehme <Dany.Nehme@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-11 10:31
Subject: Corporate Games - Final Schedule
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Captains,

 

I hope this email finds you well, all feeling energized and ready to take on the 2025 Corporate Games this weekend.

 

The excitement is building, and we can't wait to see you in action.

 

Attached, you will find the final schedule we received from the organizer, which includes a few updates. Please take a moment to review it and share it with your team members so everyone is on the same page.

 

Wishing you and your team the best of luck - let us make this an unforgettable experience!

 

Regards,
